text.data: Several years after the horrible war...[0xfc][0x1][end1]
Lagoon of the Forgotten Region Island of Tedd[0xfc][0x1][end1]
On this island...[0xfc][0x1][end1]A
A resistance movement opposing the Empire began to form, comprised of surviving knights of Kahna.[0xfc][0x1][end1]Z
Zora: Finally...[end]L
Lukia: He's come back...[end]
Chapter 1 The Beginning[end]M
Melodia: [character][0x1]!![end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]!![end]B
Bikkebakke: .........[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]'s back!![end]Z
Zora: [character][0x1]'s back!![end]
Captain of the Knights of Mahal Taicho[end]T
Taicho: [character][0x1]!! It is I, Taicho of the Mahal Knights![end]
Master Summoner, Single Sendak[end]S
Sendak: So you are back, [character][0x1]? There are a great many things to discuss.[end]
Knight of Kahna Virgo [0x2f] Blood Type O Matelite[end]M
Matelite: [0x2a]Yawn[0x2a] Ahhh, what a nice nap![end]Z
Zora: Hey! Hurry up and get [character][0x1] out here!![end]T
Truce: Alright, everybody! Saddle up! Our plan to save Princess [character][0x1] starts now!![end]

Dear [character][0x1]...
How are you? Where are you traveling to now?
Several winters have passed since the war...[end]

Since our Kahna was destroyed... Since the Granbelos Empire conquered the world... Those battles are now old history...
The resistance group created as per the deceased king's final wish is but only a name. Without you, [character][0x1], everyone seems saddened.[end]

Yes... The snow has already begun to fall here.
Winter looks like it will be cold again this year.
Well, that is all. Please take care of yourself. From Sendak[end]R

Rush: Hey, [character][0x1]! Let's get going. It's not like we'll never see them again.
You're the one who decided to do this, [character][0x1]! You were the one who said to revive Kahna's Dragon Squad.[end]T
Truce: So first we have to find all the dragons that escaped. Then we take back our ship, Kahna's flagship![end]B
Bikkebakke: This time we'll take good care of them and raise them to be the most powerful attack dragons![end]R
Rush: Let's go!![end]L
Lukia: It'll be lonely without you...[end]Z
Zora: Take care...[end]M
Melodia, aren't you going to say anything? [character][0x1]'s leaving![end]S
Sendak: I... I...[end]M
Matelite: [character][0x1]!! Come back soon! Come back while [character][0x1]'s still safe![end]G
Give this dragon a name.[end]M
Matelite: [character][0x1]... Even with all these memories of you it still hurts...[end]M
Matelite: [character][0x1]... You have memories of [character][0x1] too, don't you?[end]
Yes No[end1]W
With that lovely face of hers... Such nice memories...[end]O
Oh... Well I can't share my memories with you...[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]. I want to go rescue her this very minute...[end]S

Sendak: Welcome back, [character][0x1]. It looks like you found all the dragons.
By the way, do you remember the day you left?[end]
I forget. Tell me about it. I don't want to remember.[end1]O
Oh, [character][0x1]... We're going into battle. Let's go, let's go![end]S
Sendak: Ever since then... You seem all grown up... Even I am not used to the new you...[end]T
Taicho: Do they bite? They look sort of scary.[end]T
Taicho: Matelite, does riding dragons really make you that happy? You are even crying!! I am scared to death of them. One of them licked my beard![end]R
Rush: You haven't forgotten our plan, have you?[end]F
First we need to take back Kahna's flagship before we can save Princess [character][0x1]. Let's hurry![end]Y

You know, from close up, they're kind of cute... They look like they're starving. Try giving them something to eat. Here, I'll give you these...
You received various items.[end]F
Feed this dragon.[end]G
Get on [character][0x1] and we'll leave. Are your preparations set?[end]
Feed Take off Not ready[end1]S
Sendak: [character][0x1]... Is it okay if I hold on tighter?[end]
No problem Um, that's kind of awkward...[end1][character][0x1]
[character][0x1], your back is so nice and warm...[end]B
But I will fall off... Let me hold on...[end]M
Monyo: Monyoooo! [0x28]Mini-Devils will fight too![0x29][end]M
Manyo: Manyoooo! [0x28]When we die, we'll die together![0x29][end]Y
You found 5 Magic Gins.[end]Y
You got a Genius Notebook.[end]Y
You got some Uniuji.[end]Y
You got a Drawer Thing.[end]Y
You got some Sweet Wine.[end]Y
You got a Porno Mag.[end]Y

You got Matelite's Important Item.
It's sealed tight. Will you try openingiet?[end]Y
You got [character][0x1]'sMmemory.[end][end]
